summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York requesting a review of an attached warrant application. The document is part of the Epstein case records and indicates ongoing legal proceedings in August 2019.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, requesting a review of a warrant application related to the Epstein case.

events.title: Warrant Application Review Request
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emails a request to review an attached warrant application, indicating ongoing investigative or legal action in the Epstein case.

locations.context: Office of the Assistant United States Attorney, Southern District of New York.

locations.name: Southern District of New York
locations.context: Federal judicial district handling the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 8, 2019, from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The email requests a review of an attached warrant application, indicating active legal proceedings in the Epstein case at that time.
The correspondence is part of the Epstein case records, showing communication between legal officials regarding case-related documents.
